long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension made for a project in an internship. This extension works by reading the ui of a rule engine page. The Rule engine is a page containing a graph. Each node in the graph is a div. And the nodes are connected via connectors. What the extension does is read the ui, and then construct a graph in background. Then it takes a path of the graph as an input from the user. Then it highlights the path in the graph. This is a Beta version, which contains a feature to highlight the arrows in the pat as well. This feature works well, except for when the divs are really close by.
